title: The Useless Mr. Zhuang - Novel Updates
tags: Devoted Love Interests   Family Conflict   Lazy Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Possessive Characters   Wealthy Characters   Younger Love Interests
author: 寒菽
description:
Zhuang Hanxue was a no-good 34-year-old pleasure seeker, passing each day freely and merrily. Still savvy at his age, he started an online relationship and earned a boyfriend. The shou in his 30s calmly accepted it. Being a shou was very good, it was really pleasurable, really relaxing. His family's Qiu Zheyan mustn't treat him too well! Every day he acted like a salted fish. Staying at home loafing around was really good, hee hee hee =v=

However, a good thing doesn't last forever. His family's little wolf encountered a financial crisis. The useless Mr. Zhuang recalled that his own family still had millions waiting for him to inherit. 'Just wait, I'll go borrow some money for you. Is 100 million enough?'

Qiu Zheyan, who had believed he was raising a poor lover, '???'
>
